sections.name: App Story
sections.content: A local Library Manager that stores books, members, and loans as JSON files on the user's computer. It manages book records, member records, and loan records and enforces that a loan cannot be created when a book has no available copies or when a member has reached their loan limit. All data persists locally as JSON and the application runs fully offline.

sections.name: Entry Point
sections.content:
Run with: python library_manager.py

When executed it runs non-interactively, reads and writes the local JSON datastore, and prints concise operation summaries to stdout.
